headline.print_headline: NTSB Issues Safety Alert on Wrong Airport Landings
headline.main: NTSB Issues Safety Alert on Wrong Airport Landings

docs.snippet: A federal agency overseeing transportation safety is warning pilots to take extra precautions after a pair of recent plane landings at the wrong Midwest airports....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal agency overseeing transportation safety is warning pilots to take extra precautions after a pair of recent plane landings at the wrong Midwest airports.

headline.sub: Public rifts at Arab summit likely to satisfy Iran and Syria
headline.main: Public rifts at Arab summit likely to satisfy Iran and Syria

docs.snippet: Arab leaders at odds over supporting Islamists in upheavals across the Middle East have proved to be in no mood to reconcile at a summit this week. Deborah Lutterbeck reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Arab leaders at odds over supporting Islamists in upheavals across the Middle East have proved to be in no mood to reconcile at a summit this week. Deborah Lutterbeck reports.

headline.print_headline: World Series Champion Red Sox Relying on Youth
headline.main: World Series Champion Red Sox Relying on Youth

docs.snippet: The Boston Red Sox are sticking to a long-range blueprint for success and relying on 21-year-old shortstop Xander Bogaerts as a critical cog in defense of their World Series crown....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Boston Red Sox are sticking to a long-range blueprint for success and relying on 21-year-old shortstop Xander Bogaerts as a critical cog in defense of their World Series crown.

headline.print_headline: Peugeot Signs Dongfeng Deal, Recovery Hurdles Remain
headline.main: Peugeot Signs Dongfeng Deal, Recovery Hurdles Remain

docs.snippet: PSA Peugeot Citroen's tie-up with China's Dongfeng was signed on Wednesday, bringing the French carmaker much-needed cash and greater access to Asia but leaving major challenges ahead....
docs.lead_paragraph: PSA Peugeot Citroen's tie-up with China's Dongfeng was signed on Wednesday, bringing the French carmaker much-needed cash and greater access to Asia but leaving major challenges ahead.

headline.print_headline: Canadian Firm Wins Bidding for Peanut Butter Plant
headline.main: Canadian Firm Wins Bidding for Peanut Butter Plant

docs.snippet: A federal judge Wednesday approved a Canadian company's last-minute $26 million cash offer for an eastern New Mexico peanut butter plant that went bankrupt after a salmonella outbreak and nationwide recall....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge Wednesday approved a Canadian company's last-minute $26 million cash offer for an eastern New Mexico peanut butter plant that went bankrupt after a salmonella outbreak and nationwide recall.

headline.print_headline: Hendrick Ranks California as 1 of Toughest Defeats
headline.main: Hendrick Ranks California as 1 of Toughest Defeats

docs.snippet: It was a long cross-country flight home for Rick Hendrick after the team owner watched victory slip away for two of his drivers at Auto Club Speedway....
docs.lead_paragraph: It was a long cross-country flight home for Rick Hendrick after the team owner watched victory slip away for two of his drivers at Auto Club Speedway.

headline.print_headline: Tight Divisional Races Loom in Race for AL Pennant
headline.main: Tight Divisional Races Loom in Race for AL Pennant

headline.sub: Tight security before President Obama's visit to Rome
headline.main: Tight security before President Obama's visit to Rome

docs.snippet: Security is tight in Rome ahead of U.S. President Barack Obama's arrival, who is set to meet Pope Francis for the first time on Thursday. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Security is tight in Rome ahead of U.S. President Barack Obama's arrival, who is set to meet Pope Francis for the first time on Thursday. Jillian Kitchener reports.
